rComments: There are graded readings for this class where you have to read in Arabic. The assignments are very easy to do and so are the exams. One time the professor accused a student of getting someone else to do the reading for them so watch out.

The homework is very easy and doesn't take long to do. The exams are easy as well. The professor is very nice and gives good explanations. It's a very good beginner Arabic course. However she is particular about the style of handwriting you use. If you use different handwriting she will take off a lot of points from your grade.

I absolutely loved this professor! The class itself is very hard, but she explains all of the topics extremely well and helps you to fully understand the basics of the Arabic language. There is a lot of homework, and you ABSOLUTELY have to do it or you wont pass the class. She makes a lot of jokes but almost always stays on topic... Great class!

La professeur explique son cours très bien, tu comprend le cours avec plusieurs pratique d'exercice, il y a trop de homework mais sa aide pour le midterm et le final. J'ai apprecer apprendre la langue Arabe
